questions.question: Which of the following has the final consonant blend of "nd"?

questions.question: The “l” final consonant blend would be “-ld” in “cold”.
questions.explanation: In the word “cold,” the final consonant blend is “-ld.” A consonant blend consists of two or more consonants together in which each consonant sound is heard.
